'''Pink dye''' is one of the sixteen available [[dye]]s, crafted from various flowers or with a combination of red and white dyes.

== Obtaining ==

=== Crafting ===
{{Crafting
  |head=1
  |showname=0
  |showdescription=1
  |Pink Tulip;Cactus Flower
  |Output=Pink Dye
  |type=Material
}}
{{Crafting

  |Output=Pink Dye
  |type=Material
}}
{{Crafting
  |Peony
  |Output=Pink Dye,2
  |type=Material
}}
{{Crafting
  |Red Dye
  |White Dye
  |Output=Pink Dye,2
  |type=Material
}}
{{Crafting
  |Red Dye
  |Bone Meal
  |Output=Pink Dye,2
  |type=Material
  |description={{only|bedrock|education}}
  |foot=1
}}

=== Trading ===
[[Wandering trader]]s sell 3 pink dye for an [[emerald]].
